official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against income tax to individuals for tuition expenses incurred in providing nonprofit elementary and secondary education.

summary.text: Allows a credit against the income tax for 50 percent of the tuition paid during the year to any nonprofit elementary or secondary school for the education of a dependent. Limits the allowable credit for any dependent to $500.
